Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Permits Yates county assistant district attorneys and assistant public defenders to reside in Chemung county
Summary: Permits Yates county assistant district attorneys and assistant public defenders to reside in Chemung county.
LawCode: Amd ยง3, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, permitting Yates county assistant district attorneys and assistant public defenders to reside in Chemung county
